text: pitney bowes success is focused on
innovation and how quickly we can
deliver innovation to our customers I am
Olga Olga Nova I work at pitney bowes
and I MVP of software engineering
responsible for SAS applications and big
data and analytics pitney bowes is all
about making our customers successful
and we were looking for a partner who is
equally customer focused we have an
existing product called spectrum on
demand to add high-value data enrichment
and data quality solutions to they exist
in products like CRM in our traditional
data center solution it was probably
have to spend about six months planning
it out and then we would still have to
plan for the peak capacity and we would
not have an ability to scale down so our
cost would be significantly higher
instead of doing that the team decided
to move this product to AWS and they
were able to accomplish it in six weeks
and as a result we came up not only with
architectures it is significantly more
scalable but it also allowed us to save
in our estimate about sixty percent in
our production costs going forward
pitney bowes is very happy to become
advanced AWS partner we are gaining a
lot of benefits from this program we are
building a center of excellence to make
sure that our teams that are getting
involved with AWS benefit from the best
practices and expertise we also plan to
coordinate joint go to market activities
with AWS to better serve our enterprise
customer base we are very interested in
SAS partnership program and exploring it
further because it helps us to open new
opportunities through collaboration
between AWS sales team and pitney bowes
sales team AWS is one of the most
innovative technology companies in the
world innovation that comes not only
